description:
The Lifestyle Fine Gauge No Show are ultralight socks for everyday comfort and style. Made with a luxurious fine-gauge merino yarn, they are breathable, stretchy and soft next to your skin. The uncushioned design features a blend of merino wool, nylon and LYCRA® with key support zones in the Achilles and instep. The seamless toe reduces bulk and prevents blisters.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Lifestyle No Show Socks - Fine Gauge - Mens

specs.value: 55% Wool, 43% Nylon, 2% Elastane - Exclusive of decoration
